name: I Should Leave
description:
You have to escape a party crashed by some demonic guests without alerting them you're human. Help them out and they'll give you advice on how to leave.

But talking to people at parties isn't easy. You have to type your responses to their questions. If you take too long or misspeak it could have consequences!

If you happen to die, don't give up! You may be able to use some knowledge you've gained from a past life to skip some awkward conversations and pick up where you left off.

When talking to demons, you will sometimes see text at the bottom of the screen. You must accurately type out the response or they'll grow agitated or hostile!

This is a prototype, it should take only 10-15 minutes to play. If you have feedback about the game so far please submit it here. The full game will take place in an expanded setting and I need your help to shape the direction of the game!

CONTROLS:
WASD: Move
SHIFT: Crouch
ESC: Pause
LEFT MOUSE: Check / Pickup Item / Cycle Text / Advance Text
RIGHT MOUSE: Drop Item / Cycle Text / Advance Text
...and of course the who keyboard when typing!

This game uses placeholder assets that are all under the CC0 License.
